Name: 乔乔的铁拳 Joe's Fists
About the game: Swing the handle forward like a straight punch, and your fist will fly out quickly.This is your only skill. How to use your fists to defeat enemies, solve puzzles, and break through obstacles will be your test. The right PUNCH method : Keep the fist horizontal, then quickly push forward, the direction of the handle will determine the final punch direction Element attributes : There are three natural elements in the game: water \ fire \ electricity. There is a one-way mutual restraint between the elements. Your fist can temporarily store the acquired elements, and the elements will be used to crack the organs, attack the enemy, etc. Organ props : There are many obstacles in the game, and cracking the mechanism is the only way to clear the customs. The methods of cracking the mechanism are hidden in your fist
